content:
Has anyone taken this course offered by hl7.org?
http://www.hl7.org/training/fhir-fundamentals.cfm

Finished already

@voinea aurelian sebastian Did you find it helpful? I have no prior experience with FHIR and I'm trying to decide if I should take the course or learn by doing on my own.
Sorry for the late reply yes fie me was helpful and yes there is a mix between you are doing on your own however you have a mentor assigned
That course looks helpful. Do they typically offer it every year? I don't see any more chances on the upcoming calendar.
They run it at least once, sometimes twice per year. @Sadhana Alangar will be working with the instructors to determine the offering time(s) for 2020 now.
